bug.author: naetherm
bug.summary: Logs are not displayed correctly in terminal
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Unable to see the logs correctly. Unfortunately the only things visible within in terminal are callback errors: <denchmark-code>$ polyaxon experiment -xp X logs building -- scheduled -- starting -- running -- error from callback <function SocketTransportMixin.socket.<locals>.<lambda> at 0x7fd723146400>: the JSON object must be str, not 'bytes' error from callback <function SocketTransportMixin.socket.<locals>.<lambda> at 0x7fd723146400>: the JSON object must be str, not 'bytes' error from callback <function SocketTransportMixin.socket.<locals>.<lambda> at 0x7fd723146400>: the JSON object must be str, not 'bytes' error from callback <function SocketTransportMixin.socket.<locals>.<lambda> at 0x7fd723146400>: the JSON object must be str, not 'bytes' error from callback <function SocketTransportMixin.socket.<locals>.<lambda> at 0x7fd723146400>: the JSON object must be str, not 'bytes' ... error from callback <bound method SocketTransportMixin._on_close of <polyaxon_client.transport.Transport object at 0x7fd723190978>>: _on_close() missing 1 required positional argument: 'ws' </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Started experiment with polyaxon run -u and then started the logs-view polyaxon experiment -xp X logs <denchmark-h:h4>Experiment:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/polyaxon/polyaxon-examples/tree/master/tensorflow/cifare10/polyaxonfile.yml>https://github.com/polyaxon/polyaxon-examples/tree/master/tensorflow/cifare10/polyaxonfile.yml</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Building -- creating image - master.1 -- INFO:tensorflow:Using config: {'_model_dir': '/outputs/root/cifar10/experiments/1', '_save_checkpoints_secs': 600, '_num_ps_replicas': 0, '_keep_checkpoint_max': 5, '_session_config': gpu_options { master.1 -- force_gpu_compatible: true master.1 -- } </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Local</denchmark-h>
polyaxon is running within a virtualenv using python3. <denchmark-h:h4>Cluster</denchmark-h>
OS: Ubuntu 18.04 Kubernetes: 1.12.1

comments.comment: What version are you running: <denchmark-code>polyaxon version polyaxon version --platform </denchmark-code>

<denchmark-h:h3>polyaxon version</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Current cli version: 0.2.7. Supported cli versions: -------------- ----- latest_version 0.2.7 min_version 0.2.3 -------------- ----- </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>polyaxon version --platform</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Current platform version: 0.2.7. Supported platform versions: -------------- ----- latest_version 0.2.7 min_version 0.2.3 -------------- ----- </denchmark-code>
The second output for polyaxon version --platform is not correct?
Ah yeah, sorry. Were the same version numbers as above, so I just copied it. Edited the entry.
Can you run polyaxon upgrade it will installl cli 0.2.8, it has a small fix.

Did that, also did a helm upgrade. Cli and platform are now both 0.2.8. But the error remains. <denchmark-code>error from callback <function SocketTransportMixin.socket.<locals>.<lambda> at 0x7f355833f6a8>: the JSON object must be str, not 'bytes' </denchmark-code>
polyaxon upgrade does not do a helm upgrade. Can you see the logs on the dashboard?

polyaxon upgrade does not do a helm upgrade.
Yes, but did a helm upgrade polyaxon polyaxon/polyaxon -f <FILE> The logs on the dashboard can be seen as expected, no problem with that.
was it working before, or you were not able to see the logs correctly before?
Before that, the logs were visible in the dashboard. The problem only occurs within the terminal.

Can you do the following two commands and return the results: <denchmark-code>polyaxon -v experiment -xp X logs </denchmark-code>
and <denchmark-code>pip freeze </denchmark-code>

Ok course: <denchmark-h:h3>polyaxon -v experiment -xp X logs</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Setting OrderedDict([('check_count', 83), ('current_version', '0.2.8'), ('min_version', '0.2.3'), ('log_handler', OrderedDict([('dsn', 'aHR0cHM6Ly84MTc4MjEwYjY4NDU0OGE1Yjk2YjgxMzFmYTY0NWM5ZTozY2IwZGI1OTY5NDU0NjNkYTUzMmUzNmRiZTQ4NjFmNUBzZW50cnkuaW8vMTE5NzQxNg=='), ('environment', 'production'), ('tags', {'cli_min_version': '0.2.3', 'platform_latest_version': '0.2.7', 'chart_version': '0.2.7', 'platform_min_version': '0.2.3', 'cli_latest_version': '0.2.7'})]))]) in the file .polyaxoncli Starting request to url: http://10.8.152.97:31811/api/v1/versions/cli/ with params: None, data: None Starting new HTTP connection (1): 10.8.152.97:31811 http://10.8.152.97:31811 "GET /api/v1/versions/cli/ HTTP/1.1" 200 None Response Content: b'{"latest_version":"0.2.8","min_version":"0.2.3"}', Headers: {'Content-Encoding': 'gzip', 'Server': 'nginx/1.10.3 (Ubuntu)', 'Vary': 'Origin, Cookie', 'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Allow': 'GET, HEAD, OPTIONS', 'Date': 'Wed, 17 Oct 2018 13:37:16 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'X-Frame-Options': 'SAMEORIGIN'} Setting OrderedDict([('check_count', 83), ('current_version', '0.2.8'), ('min_version', '0.2.3'), ('log_handler', OrderedDict([('dsn', 'aHR0cHM6Ly84MTc4MjEwYjY4NDU0OGE1Yjk2YjgxMzFmYTY0NWM5ZTozY2IwZGI1OTY5NDU0NjNkYTUzMmUzNmRiZTQ4NjFmNUBzZW50cnkuaW8vMTE5NzQxNg=='), ('environment', 'production'), ('tags', {'cli_min_version': '0.2.3', 'platform_latest_version': '0.2.7', 'chart_version': '0.2.7', 'platform_min_version': '0.2.3', 'cli_latest_version': '0.2.7'})]))]) in the file .polyaxoncli error -- Experiment is not running, current status: succeeded Session ended </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>pip freeze</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>args==0.1.0 blessings==1.6.1 certifi==2018.8.24 chardet==3.0.4 click==6.7 clint==0.5.1 idna==2.7 Jinja2==2.10 MarkupSafe==1.0 marshmallow==2.15.6 numpy==1.15.2 nvidia-ml-py3==7.352.0 pathlib==1.0.1 pkg-resources==0.0.0 polyaxon-cli==0.2.8 polyaxon-client==0.2.8 polyaxon-gpustat==0.2.8 polyaxon-schemas==0.2.8 psutil==5.4.7 python-dateutil==2.7.3 pytz==2018.5 PyYAML==3.13 raven==6.7.0 requests==2.19.1 requests-toolbelt==0.8.0 rhea==0.4.0 scikit-learn==0.20.0 scipy==1.1.0 six==1.11.0 sklearn==0.0 tabulate==0.8.2 urllib3==1.23 websocket-client==0.53.0 </denchmark-code>
error -- Experiment is not running, current status: succeeded this experiment is not running, and the logs are printing correctly here.

Hm, kk. I've started a quickstart example, resulting in the following output for polyaxon -v experiment -xp X logs: <denchmark-code>Setting OrderedDict([('check_count', 87), ('current_version', '0.2.8'), ('min_version', '0.2.3'), ('log_handler', OrderedDict([('dsn', 'aHR0cHM6Ly84MTc4MjEwYjY4NDU0OGE1Yjk2YjgxMzFmYTY0NWM5ZTozY2IwZGI1OTY5NDU0NjNkYTUzMmUzNmRiZTQ4NjFmNUBzZW50cnkuaW8vMTE5NzQxNg=='), http://10.8.152.97:31811 "GET /api/v1/versions/cli/ HTTP/1.1" 200 None Response Content: b'{"latest_version":"0.2.8","min_version":"0.2.3"}', Headers: {'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', What os are you using? Can you run this in the virualenv pip install -e git+https://github.com/polyaxon/polyaxon-client.git@master#egg=polyaxon-client==0.2.8 and try again?

<denchmark-h:h3>lsb_release -a</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>No LSB modules are available. Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description: Ubuntu 16.04.5 LTS Release: 16.04 Codename: xenial </denchmark-code>
Can you run this pip install -e git+https://github.com/polyaxon/polyaxon-client.git@master#egg=polyaxon-client==0.2.8 and try again?
That solved the problem. Many thanks for your patience!
Ok, I knew it was a ubuntu issue. The fix you are running now will be part of next release, thank you for reporting as well üëç

I confirm the error when an experiment is terminated and when running the command: <denchmark-code>$ polyaxon experiment -xp 24 resources
error from callback <function SocketTransportMixin.socket.<locals>.<lambda> at 0x11d104b70>: __init__() missing 9 required positional arguments: 'job_uuid', 'experiment_uuid', 'job_name', 'container_id', 'n_cpus', 'cpu_percentage', 'percpu_percentage', 'memory_used', and 'memory_limit' Session ended </denchmark-code>
Polyaxon info: <denchmark-code>$ polyaxon version --platform
Current platform version: 0.2.9. Supported platform versions: -------------- ----- latest_version 0.2.9 min_version 0.2.7 -------------- ----- </denchmark-code>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vfdev-5>@vfdev-5</denchmark-link> resources are not saved after an experiment is finished, there's already a ticket to persist the tracked resources, but it's not done yet.
